alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 7:39PM CDT until May 14 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... West central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Saint Stephens, or 13 miles northwest of Jackson, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Saint Stephens and Leroy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
